contents.text: Thank you for calling Premier Talent Partners, your modern-day matchmakers in San Francisco.
If you are a company seeking talented professionals, press 1.
To speak with a staffing specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to one of our staffing specialists.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a staffing specialist so I can quickly source candidates for our open developer position.
Talk to a staffing specialist about translating my military logistics experience into a civilian project management role
Connect me with a staffing specialist to discuss talent acquisition and skills mapping.
I’d like to speak with someone about hiring new employees for my small business.
I’d like to speak with a staffing specialist to discuss my organization’s recruitment needs.

contents.text: To schedule a consultation for your hiring needs, press 2.
One moment please, we are transferring you to our consultation team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a consultation to outline our company’s immediate hiring strategy.
Schedule a consultation with a career advisor to map out my transition from military service into the tech sector
Schedule a consultation to architect my company's hiring strategy and workforce pipeline.
I need to set up a consultation to discuss my company’s recruiting needs.
I want to schedule a consultation to plan our upcoming hiring strategy.

contents.text: If you are a job seeker looking for opportunities, press 2.
To learn about current job openings, press 1.
Thank you, please hold while we fetch the latest job listings for you.

navigationGoals: Retrieve the latest San Francisco tech job listings for me to review.
Look up current job openings in cybersecurity or IT that welcome veteran applicants in the San Francisco area
Fetch current job openings matching my tech stack.
I’m looking to hear about current job vacancies I might qualify for.
I’m interested in reviewing the latest physics-related job openings.

contents.text: To submit your resume for consideration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our candidate intake team.

navigationGoals: Submit my resume for consideration for relevant positions as soon as possible.
Submit my resume for consideration for operations and logistics positions
Submit my resume to the candidate intake system for evaluation.
I want to submit my resume so you can consider me for job opportunities.
I’d like to submit my resume for consideration for any suitable physics positions.
